subject: Nice to meet you
mailbody:
Nice to meet you

With warm heart, I offer my friendship and greetings, I hope this message meet you in good time. However, Mine names are Farah Yusifi am a female of 24 years old. I have sent you mail twice but you never replied any of them , i have been wondering if the messages ever gets to your inbox. I humbly ask that you reply this message, to enable me disclose the reason I have been trying to reach out to you. I do apologize for infringing on your privacy.

Greetings from Farah Yusif

subject: Re: Nice to meet you
mailbody: Received: from Dear Sir Marmite Luny-Binns DFC
